# Medal "50 Years of the Mongolian People's Revolution"

|type=Award|eligibility=Mongolian and foreign citizens|awarded_for=|campaign=|status=|description=|clasps=|established=|firstawarded=June 9, 1970|lastawarded=|total_awarded=|total_awarded_posthumously=|total_recipients=|individual=|higher=|same=|lower=|related=|image2=50 Years Anniversary of the Mongolian Revolution rib.PNG|caption2=}}
The '''Medal "50 Years of the Mongolian People's Revolution"''' () was a state award of the Mongolian People's Republic.
See also
* Hero of the Mongolian People's Republic
* Order of Sukhbaatar
